message.en:
The application has been completely rewritten and updated to Material 3. Now, with the new architecture, it should start up and run faster than before + some bugs have been fixed for the landscape layout. Some bugs may still exist, but as always, they will be fixed later :)

Friendly and cozy weather:)
Anton
message.it:
L'applicazione √® stata completamente riscritta e aggiornata a Material 3. Ora, con la nuova architettura, dovrebbe avviarsi e funzionare pi√π velocemente rispetto a prima + alcuni bug sono stati corretti per il layout in orizzontale. Potrebbero ancora esistere alcuni bug, ma come sempre, saranno corretti in seguito :)

Pazienti e caldi giorni:)
Anton

message.en:
- new: it is easier to set limits for notes when you writing for a social network. Added Instagram, Discord, Twitter, Facebook, Vkontakte limits
 - new: close keyboard button for mobile.

 - improved: special symbols line replaced with keyboard for mobile iews
 - improved: note layout has a wider window to write for mobile

 - fix: hide keyboard if note or idea is not empty.

Wish you nice weather:)
Anton

- new: menu in notes with two options: delete & limit note by Instagram post maximum (2,200 characters). 
 - new: settings option to set default limit for all new notes.

 - fixed: ideas just.. weren't work as expected. Now it is fixed:) 

 Wish you peace & love with a lot of cookies üç™ :) 
 Anton

Hi üëã, it's Anton, creator of this app. 

 Since this update hopefully all future updates will be explained through these short dialogues. 

 And when you will have any idea üóí or noticed a bug üêõ please don't hesitate to contact me in Discord (Arenukvern) (see a button at the left bottom corner) or send email üì¨ to idea@xsoulspace.dev - this info always available in information ("i" button on the top of the screen)

- new: when you edit an idea or note it will pop up(down) in the list, the direction is dependant on settings
- new: idea & notes direction switch - you can choose how ideas & notes will be aligned in the list from bottom to top or from top to bottom 

- improved: new icon 
- improved: nicer layout for settings
- improved: more stability in all scrolling
- improved: now desktop versions have no back button when there is no need in it 

- fixed: scrollbars offset for desktop versions 

 Have a nice day and week! 
 Anton
